Room.Name: A trail leading to a dense mass of trees
Room.Description: You are standing on a dusty path leading to a dense forest filled with trees. You can see that the trees are so dense that it is likely dark among many of them. You can hear the howls of wolves and other forest creatures as you grow closer. Leaves crackle under your feet as you walk.

Room.Name: A trail leading to a dense mass of trees
Room.Description: You are standing on a dusty path leading to a dense forest filled with trees. You can see that the trees are so dense that it is likely dark among many of them. You can hear the howls of wolves and other forest creatures as you grow closer. Leaves crackle under your feet as you walk.

Room.Name: A trail leading to a dense mass of trees
Room.Description: You are standing on a dusty path leading to a dense forest filled with trees. You can see that the trees are so dense that it is likely dark among many of them. You can hear the howls of wolves and other forest creatures as you grow

Room.Name: Pushing your way into the forest
Room.Description: You push your way through a dense wall of vines and into a dense forest. You are surrounded by trees in all directions. They are so dense you can hardly tell from which direction you came.

Room.Name: In a dark forest.
Room.Description: You are walking through a forest so dense no light shows through the canope of trees overhead, you hear the howling of wolves and the snarling of mountain lions off in the distance, leaves and tiny insects crunch under your feet as you walk. Mice scurry around on the ground all around you.

Room.Name: In a dark forest.
Room.Description: You are walking through a forest so dense no light shows through the canope of trees overhead, you hear the howling of wolves and the snarling of mountain lions off in the distance, leaves and tiny insects crunch under your feet as you walk.

Room.Name: A trail leading to a small spring
Room.Description: Rays of light shine through the trees lightening the forest up a bit as you hear a trickle of water off to the west indicating there might me a small spring nearby.

Room.Name: A trail leading to a small spring
Room.Description: Rays of light shine through the trees lightening the forest up a bit as you hear a trickle of water off to the west indicating there might me a small spring nearby.

Room.Name: A small artesian spring
Room.Description: You are standing next to a small artesian spring. Water bubbles up from the ground and creates a small pool of sweet cool water, just the thing to refresh you on a hot day.

Room.Name: In a dark forest
Room.Description: You are walking through a forest so dense no light shows through the canope of trees overhead, you hear the howling of wolves and the snarling of mountain lions off in the distance, leaves and tiny insects crunch under your feet as you walk.

Room.Name: In a dark forest
Room.Description: You are walking through a forest so dense no light shows through the canope of trees overhead, you hear the howling of wolves and the snarling of mountain lions off in the distance, leaves and tiny insects crunch under your feet as you walk.

Room.Name: At the entrance to a Cave.
Room.Description: Before you you see a large outcropping of rocks, with a small opening in the middle, coming fromt eh cave you hear the growling of a bear. Are you sure you want to go in there?

Room.Name: In a dark cave
Room.Description: You are standing inside a cold dark cave. You feel hard packed dirt beneath you feet and as you look around you see bones littering the floor about the cave, dare you go any further?

Room.Name: A passage in the cave
Room.Description: You are standing in a dark passage within the cave. You feel a crunching beneath your feet ,as you look down you see bones line the floor beneath your feet The passageway twists and turns as you walk through it.

Room.Name: A passage in the cave
Room.Description: You are standing in a dark passage within the cave. You feel a crunching beneath your feet ,as you look down you see bones line the floor beneath your feet The passageway twists and turns as you walk through it.

Room.Name: A passage in the cave
Room.Description: You are standing in a dark passage within the cave. You feel a crunching beneath your feet ,as you look down you see bones line the floor beneath your feet The passageway twists and turns as you walk through it.

Room.Name: Inside the bear's den
Room.Description: You are standing in a large open room withing the dark cave, a huge bear, larger than any you have seen before is lying on a pile of bones in the corner growling at you, you feel a sudden urge to leave this place.

Room.Name: In a dark forest
Room.Description: You are walking through a forest so dense no light shows through the canope of trees overhead, you hear the howling of wolves and the snarling of mountain lions off in the distance, leaves and tiny insects crunch under your feet as you walk.

Room.Name: In a dark forest
Room.Description: You are walking through a forest so dense no light shows through the canope of trees overhead, you hear the howling of wolves and the snarling of mountain lions off in the distance, leaves and tiny insects crunch under your feet as you walk.

Room.Name: In a dark forest
Room.Description: You are walking through a forest so dense no light shows through the canope of trees overhead, you hear the howling of wolves and the snarling of mountain lions off in the distance, leaves and tiny insects crunch under your feet as you walk.

Room.Name: In a dark forest
Room.Description: You are walking through a forest so dense no light shows through the canope of trees overhead, you hear the howling of wolves and the snarling of mountain lions off in the distance, leaves and tiny insects crunch under your feet as you walk.

Room.Name: In a dark forest
Room.Description: You are walking through a forest so dense no light shows through the canope of trees overhead, you hear the howling of wolves and the snarling of mountain lions off in the distance, leaves and tiny insects crunch under your feet as you walk.

Room.Name: In a dark forest
Room.Description: You are walking through a forest so dense no light shows through the canope of trees overhead, you hear the howling of wolves and the snarling of mountain lions off in the distance, leaves and tiny insects crunch under your feet as you walk.

Room.Name: A trail heading out of the dark forest
Room.Description: You push through a thicket of bushes onto a trail leading south out of the dark forest. You can finally see the sky again. You feel a solid layer of earth beneath your feet as you head south.

Room.Name: A trail heading out of the dark forest
Room.Description: You are walking on a trail leading away from a dense mass of trees. You kick up a faint cloud of dust as you walk along the trail.

Room.Name: A trail heading out of the dark forest
Room.Description: You are walking on a trail leading away from a dense mass of trees. You kick up a faint cloud of dust as you walk along the trail.

Room.Name: Nearing an intersection
Room.Description: You are nearing an intersection leading to a main road. You hear the clickety clack of wagons and mules walking upon the road, perhaps heading off to market to seel thier wares.

Room.Name: A Twisting Cliffside
Room.Description: You are climbing a large mountain which towers over Ofcol. The path continues up the mountain, but part of it is gone. There is no way to continue by land.

NPC.name: large bear
NPC.longDescription: A massive brown bear is here, snarling at you.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Haste DarkVision Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: large bat
NPC.description: A huge Bat is here flying aroun the cave as though oblivious to the darkness.
NPC.longDescription: A huge bat is flying around here.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying DarkVision

NPC.name: wolf
NPC.description: A large grey wolf is here bearing his teeth at you. It howls at the sight of you and stares you down with his yellow eyes.
NPC.longDescription: A large grey wolf is standing here
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden ProtectionGood Sneak Flying DarkVision

Item.Name: bear's claw
Item.LongDescription: A large bear's Claw is laying here

Item.LongDescription: a pair of bat's wings lay's here twitching
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Magic NoDrop AntiGood AntiEvil VisDeath BurnProof
